parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude it from being considered electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post refers to Alina Gorghiu, who is a politician. The images in the post explicitly state "Nr. 4 pe buletinul de vot" which translates to "Number 4 on the ballot". This strongly suggests that the post is referring to her candidacy in the parliamentary elections.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The reach estimate (100K-500K) further confirms its public nature. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The explicit mention of Alina Gorghiu's position on the ballot ("Nr. 4 pe buletinul de vot") and the link to her personal website strongly suggest the objective is to influence voters to choose her. The use of paid advertising further reinforces this intention. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes Alina Gorghiu's candidacy directly.  It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear promotional campaign for a candidate. The call to action ("Learn More" linking to her website) further solidifies this.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2558185481042152</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Alina Gorghiu), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the dates), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes), and is targeted at a wide audience through paid Facebook advertising. The explicit mention of her ballot number leaves no doubt about its intention.  The fact that the post is a paid advertisement further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  While the absence of a CMF number is noteworthy, it does not negate the other strong indicators of electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Responsabilul campaniei de publicitate pe Facebook], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu scopul de a promova candidatura doamnei Alina Gorghiu la alegerile parlamentare,  prin menționarea explicită a numărului său de pe buletinul de vot ("Nr. 4 pe buletinul de vot") și prin direcționarea utilizatorilor către site-ul său web, având un efect electoral clar de influențare a voturilor în favoarea candidatei, fapt demonstrat de conținutul postării și de datele privind bugetul alocat reclamei (RON500-RON599) și numărul de impresii (70K-80K),  cu ID-ul postării pe Facebook 2558185481042152.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
